channel.title: Emote Tab
channel.description:
hi, ive forgotten how to add a tele to the emote tab.
I understand the text is in text handler class, but were do i add the corresponding teleport?
e.g
says rc, how do i make it, so that when you tele, you go to rc area
EDIT -
Ive got it
